information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-markdown-tm-grammar/blob/master/syntaxes/markdown.tmLanguage
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: Markdown

link-def.match:
^(?x:
  \s*						# Leading whitespace
  (\[)(.+?)(\])(:)		# Reference name
  [ \t]*					# Optional whitespace
  (<?)(\S+?)(>?)			# The url
  [ \t]*					# Optional whitespace
  (?:
      ((\().+?(\)))		# Match title in quotes…
    | ((").+?("))		# or in parens.
  )?						# Title is optional
  \s*						# Optional whitespace
  $
)
link-def.name: meta.link.reference.def.markdown

patterns.comment: Currently does not support un-indented second lines.
patterns.name: markup.list.unnumbered.markdown

ampersand.comment: Markdown will convert this for us. We match it so that the HTML grammar will not mark it up as invalid.
ampersand.name: meta.other.valid-ampersand.markdown

bold.begin:
(?x)
 (\*\*|__)(?=\S)								# Open
 (?=
   (
     <[^>]*+>							# HTML tags
     | (?<raw>`+)([^`]|(?!(?<!`)\k<raw>(?!`))`)*+\k<raw>
                       # Raw
     | \\[\\`*_{}\[\]()#.!+\->]?+			# Escapes
     | \[
     (
         (?<square>					# Named group
           [^\[\]\\]				# Match most chars
           | \\.						# Escaped chars
           | \[ \g<square>*+ \]		# Nested brackets
         )*+
       \]
       (
         (							# Reference Link
           [ ]?					# Optional space
           \[[^\]]*+\]				# Ref name
         )
         | (							# Inline Link
           \(						# Opening paren
             [ \t]*+				# Optional whitespace
             <?(.*?)>?			# URL
             [ \t]*+				# Optional whitespace
             (					# Optional Title
               (?<title>['"])
               (.*?)
               \k<title>
             )?
           \)
         )
       )
     )
     | (?!(?<=\S)\1).						# Everything besides
                       # style closer
   )++
   (?<=\S)\1								# Close
 )
bold.name: markup.bold.markdown

bracket.comment: Markdown will convert this for us. We match it so that the HTML grammar will not mark it up as invalid.
bracket.name: meta.other.valid-bracket.markdown

image-inline.match:
(?x:
  (\!\[)((?<square>[^\[\]\\]|\\.|\[\g<square>*+\])*+)(\])
                # Match the link text.
  (\()						# Opening paren for url
    (<?)(\S+?)(>?)			# The url
    [ \t]*					# Optional whitespace
    (?:
        ((\().+?(\)))		# Match title in parens…
      | ((").+?("))		# or in quotes.
    )?						# Title is optional
    \s*						# Optional whitespace
  (\))
)
image-inline.name: meta.image.inline.markdown

italic.begin:
(?x) (\*\b|\b_)(?=\S)								# Open
  (?=
    (
      <[^>]*+>							# HTML tags
      | (?<raw>`+)([^`]|(?!(?<!`)\k<raw>(?!`))`)*+\k<raw>
                        # Raw
      | \\[\\`*_{}\[\]()#.!+\->]?+			# Escapes
      | \[
      (
          (?<square>					# Named group
            [^\[\]\\]				# Match most chars
            | \\.						# Escaped chars
            | \[ \g<square>*+ \]		# Nested brackets
          )*+
        \]
        (
          (							# Reference Link
            [ ]?					# Optional space
            \[[^\]]*+\]				# Ref name
          )
          | (							# Inline Link
            \(						# Opening paren
              [ \t]*+				# Optional whtiespace
              <?(.*?)>?			# URL
              [ \t]*+				# Optional whtiespace
              (					# Optional Title
                (?<title>['"])
                (.*?)
                \k<title>
              )?
            \)
          )
        )
      )
      | \1\1								# Must be bold closer
      | (?!(?<=\S)\1).						# Everything besides
                        # style closer
    )++
    (?<=\S)\1								# Close
  )
italic.name: markup.italic.markdown

link-inline.match:
(?x:
    (\[)((?<square>[^\[\]\\]|\\.|\[\g<square>*+\])*+)(\])
                  # Match the link text.
    (\()						# Opening paren for url
      (<?)(.*?)(>?)			# The url
      [ \t]*					# Optional whitespace
      (?:
          ((\().+?(\)))		# Match title in parens…
        | ((").+?("))		# or in quotes.
      )?						# Title is optional
      \s*						# Optional whitespace
    (\))
  )
link-inline.name: meta.link.inline.markdown
